trans-unit.source: Defines an identifier for application domains that a cache implementation can use to interact with a host environment.
trans-unit.target: 定義快取實作可用來與主機環境互動的應用程式定義域的識別項。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environment such as ASP.NET can use the IApplicationIdentifier interface to define strings that identify individual application domains.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]主機環境，例如 ASP.NET 可以使用 IApplicationIdentifier 介面來定義識別個別應用程式定義域的字串。

trans-unit.source: The host environment implements the IApplicationIdentifier interface.
trans-unit.target: 主機環境實作 IApplicationIdentifier 介面。

trans-unit.source: This interface is then available to <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementations through the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面就可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>透過實作<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>

trans-unit.source: A cache implementation uses this reference to obtain an identifier for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 快取實作會使用這個參考來取得應用程式定義域的識別項。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET, cache implementations use the application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 中，快取實作會使用應用程式識別碼，來建構快取效能計數器的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供效能名稱可以執行多個應用程式定義域時，應用程式定義域之間區別的計數器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式定義域的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The GetApplicationId method is typically implemented by a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environment in order to construct an application identifier for an <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 通常實作 GetApplicationId 方法[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]才能建構應用程式識別項的主機環境<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>實作。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementation uses this information to identify the application domain that is currently running.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>實作會使用這項資訊來識別目前正在執行的應用程式定義域。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>

trans-unit.source: For example, in ASP.NET, the cache uses an application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，在 ASP.NET 中，快取會使用應用程式識別碼來建構快取效能計數器的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The cache calls the GetApplicationId method that is implemented by the host environment and the host returns the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 快取呼叫藉由在主機環境 GetApplicationId 方法和主機傳回的識別項。

trans-unit.source: This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供效能名稱可以執行多個應用程式定義域時，應用程式定義域之間區別的計數器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式定義域的唯一識別碼。
